content:
cilium-dbg endpoint 
 Manage endpoints 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for endpoint
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg 	 - CLI 
 cilium-dbg endpoint config 	 - View & modify endpoint configuration 
 cilium-dbg endpoint disconnect 	 - Disconnect an endpoint from the network 
 cilium-dbg endpoint get 	 - Display endpoint information 
 cilium-dbg endpoint health 	 - View endpoint health 
 cilium-dbg endpoint labels 	 - Manage label configuration of endpoint 
 cilium-dbg endpoint list 	 - List all endpoints 
 cilium-dbg endpoint log 	 - View endpoint status log
